rComments: He'a really nice, really cares about the subject. He's a fair grader, you are required to read but it's an upper div so you should be reading. If you need anything talk to him. Attendance is mandatory but if you have an emergency he's very understanding.

Off the bat Steve told us he is a hard grader and would expect us to do the readings to fully understand concepts, etc. Make sure you read or at least skim the readings it will prepare you for the pop quizzes. If you don't understand his feedback on a paper, GO TO OFFICE HOURS IT HELPS! Overall, a fair grader.

Only take this class from Steven, don't know about other Prof, if you are in the major. Don't show any emotions in class or else your participation grade will go down. Look bored and your grade will go down. You need to write PHD level papers to pass.  3 papers and pop quizzes. Only circles and question marks for comments. DON'T TAKE IT WITH HIM!
